alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, Onslow and Carteret Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 415 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bogue Inlet Pier, or 12 miles southwest of Morehead City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, North Topsail Beach, Newport, Harkers Island, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, New River Station, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Davis and Straits. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
